abstract: Rilee Leblanc, known to residents across Arizona as the 'cactus doctor,' has become man to call for ailing cactus plants; cacti and other succulents are becoming more popular across state as drought and high water bills have made green lawns impractical, but homeowners often do not know how to care for them properly.
lead_paragraph: Homeowners in Arizona often call Rilée Leblanc, known as the “cactus doctor,” who has turned a passion for the plants into a business.

headline.main: For the Prickliest Patients, a Desert Doctor Makes House Calls
headline.print_headline: For the Prickliest Patients, a Doctor Makes House Calls

snippet: Homeowners in Arizona often call Rilée Leblanc, known as the “cactus doctor,” who has turned a passion for the plants into a business.
